metadata.title: The for_each Meta-Argument - Configuration Language
metadata.description: The for_each meta-argument allows you to manage similar infrastructure resources without writing a separate block for each one.

outlineItems.title: Limitations on values used in for_each

an object is created).`),mdx("p",null,"The ",mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"p"},"for_each"),` value must be a map or set with one element per desired resource

does not implicitly convert lists or tuples to sets.
